name: Swording
description:
Swording is a silly physics game where you need to survive a never ending supply of enemies, but at least you can throw your weapon at them.

Controls:
Keyboard:
WASD - Move player
Arrows - Move weapon
Space - Release/grab weapon

Gamepad:
Left stick - Move player
Right stick - Move weapon
Right Trigger - Release/grab weapon

music: https://www.newgrounds.com/audio/listen/959471

If someone manages to get more than 10 score I'll shit my pants.
